reviewText: OK, if you're looking for high quality imagery and slick production values, this is NOT a dvd for you. But, if you want 60's and 70's kink with some hardcore, and plenty of nastiness, this is it. I personally give the subject matter 5 stars, but minus 1, for the graininess of the picture in most of the vignettes. There is no live sound, as with virtually all dirty loops of this era, but who needs it. One thing to note for potential buyers: This is the exact same collection of vignettes as the Historic Erotica release "Forced Entry" (#1). So if you already have that title, don't waste money or time buying "Alternative Sin".
